name:
Steel Diver™: Sub Wars
Update Ver. 4.1
formal_name:
Steel Diver™: Sub Wars
Update Ver. 4.1
description:
This is an update for the Steel Diver: Sub Wars game. This download does not contain the full version of the title. In order to use this update, you must have the full version of Steel Diver: Sub Wars.

The update includes:

You now have the option to remodel your sub on the Submarine Selection screen. For $0.99 (MX$11.99, R$ 1,99, plus tax) you can remodel a sub to expand the crew carrying capacity. Before this update, the number of crew each sub could carry varied, but now you can remodel any sub to carry up to six crew members.

Submarine diving and surfacing angles The angle of a sub when it dives or submerges will not be as steep, which makes it easier to evade frontal attacks.

Matched-Skills Battles Players between level 30 and level 49 can now match-up in Matched-Skills Battles.*

Play Coin requirement We have removed the Play Coin requirement for players of the free version to play Internet Mode. *

Other adjustments have also been made to balance the game and make for a more fun gaming experience.

This update also includes adjustments that were made in updates previous to Ver. 4.1.

*Broadband Internet access required for online features. For more info, go to support.nintendo.com.
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
